ReferenceBlocks.text: GALATIANS

block.text: GALATIANS

ReferenceBlocks.text: GALATIANS 1
Paul, an apostle (not from men, neither through man, but through Jesus Christ, and God the Father, who raised him from the dead),

block.text: Mi aposel Pol. Ol man ol i no salim mi, na wanpela man i no bin putim mi long wok aposel. Nogat. Mi bin kisim dispela wok long han bilong Jisas Krais wantaim God Papa, em i bin kirapim Krais long matmat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and all the brothers who are with me, to the assemblies of Galatia:

block.text: Mi wantaim olgeta brata i stap wantaim mi, mipela i raitim dispela pas i go long yupela ol manmeri bilong ol sios i stap long provins Galesia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Grace to you and peace from God the Father, and our Lord Jesus Christ,

block.text: God Papa bilong yumi, wantaim Bikpela Jisas Krais, i ken marimari long yupela na mekim bel bilong yupela i stap isi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: who gave himself for our sins, that he might deliver us out of this present evil age, according to the will of our God and Father--

block.text: Krais i bihainim laik bilong God Papa bilong yumi, na em i lusim laip bilong em yet bilong lusim sin bilong yumi. Em i mekim olsem bilong em i ken kisim bek yumi long dispela pasin nogut nau i stap long graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: to whom be the glory forever and ever. Amen.

block.text: Olsem na yumi ken litimapim nem bilong God oltaim oltaim. I tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I marvel that you are so quickly deserting him who called you in the grace of Christ to a different “good news”.

block.text: Bel bilong mi i kirap nogut tru long dispela pasin yupela i mekim. Long wok Krais i bin mekim bilong marimari long yupela, God i bin singautim yupela bilong kamap lain manmeri bilong em, tasol kwiktaim tumas yupela i lusim em, na yupela i bihainim narakain gutnius.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There isn’t another “good news.” Only there are some who trouble you, and want to pervert the Good News of Christ.

block.text: Tasol i no gat narapela gutnius i stap. Nogat tru. Sampela man i wok long paulim tingting bilong yupela tasol, na ol i laik senisim nabaut gutnius bilong Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But even though we, or an angel from heaven, should preach to you any “good news” other than that which we preached to you, let him be cursed.

block.text: Tasol sapos mipela yet i autim gutnius long yupela o sapos wanpela ensel bilong heven i autim, na sapos dispela gutnius i no wankain olsem dispela gutnius bipo mipela i bin autim long yupela, orait man i mekim dispela pasin, em i ken lus long hel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: As we have said before, so I now say again: if any man preaches to you any “good news” other than that which you received, let him be cursed.

block.text: Bipo mipela i mekim dispela tok pinis, na nau mi mekim wankain tok gen. Sapos wanpela man i autim gutnius long yupela, na em i no wankain olsem dispela gutnius bipo yupela i kisim, orait dispela man i ken lus long hel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For am I now seeking the favor of men, or of God? Or am I striving to please men? For if I were still pleasing men, I wouldn’t be a servant of Christ.

block.text: Na yupela i ting wanem? Dispela tok nau mi mekim, em i bilong ol man i ken belgut long mi o bilong God i ken belgut long mi? Ating mi wok long grisim ol man tasol, a? Harim. Sapos mi wok yet long grisim ol man, orait mi no wokman bilong Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I make known to you, brothers, concerning the Good News which was preached by me, that it is not according to man.

block.text: Ol brata, mi tokim yupela stret, dispela gutnius bipo mi bin autim long yupela, em i no samting wanpela man i bin kamapim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For neither did I receive it from man, nor was I taught it, but it came to me through revelation of Jesus Christ.

block.text: Mi no kisim dispela gutnius long wanpela man. Na ol man i no skulim mi long en. Nogat tru. Jisas Krais yet i bin soim gutnius long mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For you have heard of my way of living in time past in the Jews’ religion. How that beyond measure I persecuted the assembly of God, and ravaged it.

block.text: Yupela i harim tok pinis long ol samting mi bin mekim bipo. Yupela i save, mi bin bihainim strong bilip bilong ol Juda, na mi bin mekim nogut tru long ol manmeri bilong sios bilong God. Mi bin wok long bagarapim sios olgeta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I advanced in the Jews’ religion beyond many of my own age among my countrymen, being more exceedingly zealous for the traditions of my fathers.

block.text: Mi bin strong tumas long bihainim olgeta pasin bilong ol tumbuna bilong mi, na long dispela pasin mi mekim mi bin winim pasin bilong planti bilong ol yangpela man bilong ol Juda ol i wanlain wantaim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when it was the good pleasure of God, who separated me from my mother’s womb, and called me through his grace,

block.text: Tasol taim mama i no karim mi yet, God i makim mi pinis, na long marimari bilong en, em i singautim mi long kamap man bilong em yet. Na long taim em yet i makim

ReferenceBlocks.text: to reveal his Son in me, that I might preach him among the Gentiles, I didn’t immediately confer with flesh and blood,

block.text: em i soim Pikinini bilong en long mi, bilong mi ken kisim wok bilong autim gutnius bilong em long ol manmeri bilong ol arapela lain. Na long taim God i mekim dispela pasin long mi, mi no bin i go askim sampela man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: nor did I go up to Jerusalem to those who were apostles before me, but I went away into Arabia. Then I returned to Damascus.

block.text: Mi no bin i go long Jerusalem bilong lukim ol man i bin kamap aposel paslain long mi. Nogat. Mi go i stap long kantri Arebia. Na bihain mi go bek long taun Damaskus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to visit Peter, and stayed with him fifteen days.

block.text: Na taim tripela yia i go pinis, na mi bin i go long Jerusalem bilong toktok wantaim Pita. Na mi stap wantaim em inap long 15 de.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But of the other apostles I saw no one, except James, the Lord’s brother.

block.text: Tasol long dispela taim mi no lukim narapela aposel. Jems, em brata bilong Bikpela, em tasol mi lukim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I assure you before God that what I am writing to you is no lie.

block.text: Long dispela tok nau mi raitim long yupela, mi tok tru tumas long ai bilong God, mi no giamanim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then I came to the regions of Syria and Cilicia.

block.text: Na bihain gen mi raun nabaut insait long provins Siria na Silisia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I was still unknown by face to the assemblies of Judea which were in Christ.

block.text: Tasol ol manmeri bilong Krais i stap long ol sios bilong distrik Judia, ol i no bin lukim yet pes bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They only heard: “He who once persecuted us now preaches the faith that he once tried to destroy.”

block.text: Ol i save harim tok tasol long mi olsem, "Pastaim dispela man i wok long kilim yumi, tasol nau em i save autim gutnius bilong dispela pasin bilong bilip bipo em i wok long bagarapim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: And they glorified God in me.

block.text: Ol i harim tok long ol samting God i bin mekim long mi, na ol i litimapim nem bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: GALATIANS 2
Then after a period of fourteen years I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas, taking Titus also with me.

block.text: Mi stap inap 14 yia pinis, na bihain mi wantaim Barnabas mitupela i go long Jerusalem gen. Mi kisim Taitus na mipela i go wantaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I went up by revelation, and I laid before them the Good News which I preach among the Gentiles. And privately before those who were respected, for fear that I might be running, or had run, in vain.

block.text: God yet i bin soim mi olsem mi mas i go. Na taim mi stap long Jerusalem, mi bin toktok wantaim ol bikman tasol bilong sios, na mi tokim ol long dispela gutnius mi save autim long ol manmeri bilong ol arapela lain. Mi ting olsem, nogut dispela wok mi mekim, na bipo tu mi bin mekim, em i lus nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But not even Titus, who was with me, being a Greek, was compelled to be circumcised.

block.text: Taitus i stap wantaim mi, na em i man bilong lain Grik. Tasol ol i no tok long mipela i mas katim skin bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This was because of the false brothers secretly brought in. They stole in to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus, that they might bring us into bondage.

block.text: Tru, i gat sampela giaman brata ol i bin hait tasol na kam insait long kibung bilong mipela. Ol i kam insait bilong luk stil long dispela pasin Krais Jisas i bin givim long yumi long taim em i lusim yumi long kalabus bilong lo, na em i mekim yumi i kamap fri. Ol dispela man i laik kalabusim yumi gen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We gave no place in the way of subjection, not for an hour, that the truth of the Good News might continue with you.

block.text: Tasol mipela i no orait long tok bilong ol long katim skin bilong Taitus. Mipela i no aninit liklik long tok bilong ol. Mipela i laik bai tok tru bilong gutnius em i no ken senis, na yupela i ken bihainim stret oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But from those who were reputed to be important (whatever they were, it makes no difference to me; God doesn’t show partiality to man)-- they, I say, who were respected imparted nothing to me,

block.text: Sampela man i stap olsem ol bikman bilong sios. Long tingting bilong mi yet, ol i gat biknem o nogat, em i samting nating. God i no save tingting long nem bilong man. Tasol ol dispela man i gat nem, ol i no skruim wanpela tok moa long tok bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: but to the contrary, when they saw that I had been entrusted with the Good News for the uncircumcision, even as Peter with the Good News for the circumcision

block.text: Nogat tru. Ol i lukim olsem God i bin givim mi wok bilong autim gutnius long ol manmeri bilong ol arapela lain, olsem em i bin givim wok long Pita bilong autim gutnius long ol Juda.

ReferenceBlocks.text: (for he who appointed Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision appointed me also to the Gentiles);

block.text: Yes, God i givim strong long Pita bilong mekim wok aposel namel long ol Juda, na olsem tasol God yet i givim strong long mi bilong mekim wok aposel namel long ol arapela lain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and when they perceived the grace that was given to me, James and Cephas and John, they who were reputed to be pillars, gave to me and Barnabas the right hand of fellowship, that we should go to the Gentiles, and they to the circumcision.

block.text: Ol manmeri i lukim Jems na Pita na Jon olsem ol bikman bilong sios, na taim ol dispela man i save pinis olsem, God i bin marimari long mi na i givim dispela wok long mi, orait ol i sekan long mi wantaim Barnabas, na kisim mitupela olsem brata tru bilong ol. Na mipela olgeta i wanbel na pasim tok olsem, mitupela i ken mekim wok namel long ol manmeri bilong ol arapela lain, na ol yet i ken mekim wok namel long ol Juda.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They only asked us to remember the poor--which very thing I was also zealous to do.

block.text: Ol i givim wanpela tok tasol long mitupela. Ol i laik bai mitupela i mas mekim wok bilong helpim ol rabisman i stap long sios bilong ol. Bipo yet mi bin amamas long mekim dispela kain wok, na mi wok strong yet long mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when Peter came to Antioch, I resisted him to his face, because he stood condemned.

block.text: Tasol bihain, taim Pita i kam long taun Antiok, mi krosim em long pes bilong em stret, long wanem, em i bin mekim pasin i no stret.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For before some people came from James, he ate with the Gentiles. But when they came, he drew back and separated himself, fearing those who were of the circumcision.

block.text: Taim ol lain bilong Jems i no kamap yet, Pita i save kaikai wantaim ol man bilong ol arapela lain. Tasol taim ol dispela lain i kamap pinis, orait Pita i pret long dispela lain Kristen i save strong long pasin bilong katim skin. Olsem na em i stap longwe long ol man bilong ol arapela lain, na em i no poroman moa wantaim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And the rest of the Jews joined him in his hypocrisy; so that even Barnabas was carried away with their hypocrisy.

block.text: Ol arapela Juda tu ol i mekim dispela pasin giaman wantaim em. Na bihain dispela pasin giaman bilong ol em i pulim tingting bilong Barnabas tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when I saw that they didn’t walk uprightly according to the truth of the Good News, I said to Peter before them all, “If you, being a Jew, live as the Gentiles do, and not as the Jews do, why do you compel the Gentiles to live as the Jews do?”

block.text: Tasol taim mi lukim ol i no bihainim stret tok tru bilong gutnius, mi tokim Pita long ai bilong ol olsem, "Yu wanpela man bilong lain Juda. Tasol yu bihainim pasin olsem yu man bilong arapela lain, na i no olsem yu man bilong lain Juda. Olsem na watpo yu strong long ol man bilong ol arapela lain long ol i mas bihainim pasin bilong ol Juda?" manmeri long ai bilong God

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We were born Jews by nature, and not Gentile sinners.

block.text: Tru, yumi ol Juda yumi bin kamap long lain bilong Juda. Yumi no kamap long ol arapela lain, em ol man bilong mekim sin. Nogat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even so, we know that a man is not justified by the works of the law but through faith in Jesus Christ. Even we believed in Christ Jesus, that we might be justified by faith in Christ, and not by the works of the law. No flesh will be justified by the works of the law.

block.text: Tasol yumi save, God i no ting long man i bihainim lo bilong Moses, na long dispela as em i kolim em stretpela man. Nogat. Man i bilip long Krais Jisas, em tasol God i save kolim stretpela man. Yumi tu yumi bilip pinis long Krais Jisas, long wanem, yumi save, long dispela rot tasol God i ken kolim yumi stretpela man, na i no long rot bilong bihainim lo. Long wanem, i no gat wanpela man em inap bihainim gut ol lo na bai God i kolim em stretpela man. Nogat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if, while we sought to be justified in Christ, we ourselves also were found sinners, is Christ a servant of sin? Certainly not!

block.text: Taim yumi bihainim dispela rot bilong bilip long Krais na kamap stretpela man long ai bilong God, yumi lukim olsem yumi Juda tu yumi lain bilong mekim sin wankain olsem ol arapela lain. Orait ating yumi inap tok, Krais yet em i laik mekim sin i kamap strong, a? Nogat tru. Yumi no ken tok olsem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if I build up again those things which I destroyed, I prove myself a law-breaker.

block.text: Sapos mi pinisim pasin bilong i stap aninit long lo na bihain mi kirapim bek dispela pasin gen, orait mi yet mi kamap man bilong mekim sin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I, through the law, died to the law, that I might live to God.

block.text: Tasol lo i putim mi long rot bilong i dai na long ai bilong lo mi stap olsem man i dai pinis. Na long dispela rot nau mi stap laip wantaim God. Mi hangamap pinis long diwai kros wantaim Krais na mi dai wantaim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have been crucified with Christ, and it is no longer I that live, but Christ living in me. That life which I now live in the flesh, I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself up for me.

block.text: na mi kisim nupela laip. Tasol dispela laip em i no laip bilong mi yet. Nogat. Krais em i stap laip insait long mi. Na nau olgeta pasin na wok mi mekim long dispela graun, em mi mekim long rot bilong bilip. Mi bilip long Pikinini Bilong God em i bin laikim mi tru na em i lusim laip bilong em yet bilong helpim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I don’t make void the grace of God. For if righteousness is through the law, then Christ died for nothing!”

block.text: Mi no laik mekim marimari bilong God i kamap olsem samting nating. Sapos lo bilong Moses em inap long mekim yumi i kamap stretpela man long ai bilong God, orait Krais i dai nating tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: GALATIANS 3
Foolish Galatians, who has bewitched you not to obey the truth, before whose eyes Jesus Christ was openly set forth among you as crucified?

block.text: Yupela longlong man bilong Galesia, mipela i soim Jisas Krais pinis long yupela. I olsem ai bilong yupela yet i lukim em i hangamap i stap long diwai kros. Husat nau i paulim tingting bilong yupela?

ReferenceBlocks.text: I just want to learn this from you. Did you receive the Spirit by the works of the law, or by hearing of faith?

block.text: Mi laik askim yupela long wanpela samting tasol. Yupela i kisim Holi Spirit long wanem rot tru? Long rot bilong bihainim lo? O long rot bilong harim gutnius na bilip?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Are you so foolish? Having begun in the Spirit, are you now completed in the flesh?

block.text: Yupela i kamap longlong pinis, a? Yupela i bin statim wokabaut bilong yupela long strong bilong Holi Spirit, na nau yupela i laik pinisim long strong bilong yupela yet?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Did you suffer so many things in vain, if it is indeed in vain?

block.text: Ating ol hevi bipo i kamap long yupela, em yupela i karim nating, a? Tasol mi no ting yupela i karim nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He therefore who supplies the Spirit to you, and works miracles among you, does he do it by the works of the law, or by hearing of faith?

block.text: God i givim Holi Spirit long yupela na i wokim ol mirakel namel long yupela. Bilong wanem em i mekim olsem? Em i ting long yupela i bihainim lo na em i mekim? O em i ting long yupela i bin harim gutnius na bilip na em i mekim olsem?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even as Abraham

block.text: Buk bilong God i gat tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “believed God, and it was counted to him for righteousness.”

block.text: "Abraham i bilipim tok bilong God, olsem na God i kolim em stretpela man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Know therefore that those who are of faith, the same are children of Abraham.

block.text: Olsem na yupela i ken save olsem, ol man i bilip long gutnius, ol i pikinini tru bilong Abraham.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Scripture, foreseeing that God would justify the Gentiles by faith, preached the Good News beforehand to Abraham, saying,

block.text: Bipo yet God i save olsem, bihain ol arapela lain bai i bilip long gutnius, na em i ting long em bai i kolim ol stretpela manmeri. Olsem na bipo tru em i autim gutnius long Abraham, olsem buk bilong God i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “In you all the nations will be blessed.”

block.text: "Long yu God bai i mekim gut long olgeta lain manmeri."

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then, those who are of faith are blessed with the faithful Abraham.

block.text: Abraham i bilip na God i bin mekim gut long em. Na olsem tasol God bai i mekim gut long olgeta manmeri i bilip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For as many as are of the works of the law are under a curse. For it is written,

block.text: Tasol God bai i bagarapim olgeta man i ting pasin bilong bihainim lo em inap mekim ol i kamap stretpela manmeri long ai bilong God. Long wanem, buk bilong God i gat tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Cursed is everyone who doesn’t continue in all things that are written in the book of the law, to do them.”

block.text: "Sapos wanpela man i no bihainim tru olgeta tok i stap long buk bilong lo, orait God i ken bagarapim dispela man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now that no man is justified by the law before God is evident, for,

block.text: Na buk bilong God i gat tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The righteous will live by faith.”

block.text: "Ol man i bilip, bai God i kolim ol stretpela man na ol bai i stap laip."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The law is not of faith, but,

block.text: Na dispela tok i soim yumi klia olsem, i no gat rot bilong wanpela man i bihainim lo na God i kolim em stretpela man.
Rot bilong bihainim lo, em i no samting bilong bilip. Nogat. Em i samting bilong em yet. Long wanem, buk bilong God i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The man who does them will live by them.”

block.text: "Man i bihainim olgeta lo, em bai i stap laip."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Christ redeemed us from the curse of the law, having become a curse for us. For it is written,

block.text: Lo em i tok olsem, yumi olgeta man i no bihainim olgeta tok bilong lo, yumi mas bagarap. Tasol bilong helpim yumi, Krais yet i kisim dispela nem "man bilong bagarap" na em i kisim bek yumi. Buk bilong God i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Cursed is everyone who hangs on a tree,”

block.text: "Olgeta man i hangamap long diwai, God i lukim ol olsem man bilong bagarap tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: that the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Christ Jesus; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith.

block.text: God i bin givim blesing long Abraham na tok long em bai i mekim gut long olgeta lain manmeri. Na long dispela wok Jisas Krais i bin mekim, nau dispela blesing i kamap pinis long olgeta lain manmeri, na yumi olgeta i ken bilip long gutnius na kisim Holi Spirit, olsem bipo God i bin tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Brothers, speaking of human terms, though it is only a man’s covenant, yet when it has been confirmed, no one makes it void, or adds to it.

block.text: Ol brata, mi tok nau long pasin bilong yumi man. Sapos wanpela man i ting long em bai i dai, na em i raitim tok bilong skelim gut ol samting bilong en long ol pikinini bilong en, orait dispela tok bilong en i kamap olsem wanpela kontrak, na i no gat man i save skruim sampela tok moa long en, na i no gat man i save tok, "Yumi no ken bihainim tok bilong dispela kontrak."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the promises were spoken to Abraham and to his seed. He doesn’t say, “To seeds,” as of many, but as of one, “To your seed,” which is Christ.

block.text: Orait bipo God i bin tok long gutpela samting bai i kamap bihain. Dispela promis God i givim long Abraham wantaim pikinini bilong en. Buk bilong God i no tok olsem, "Long ol pikinini bilong yu." Em i no tok long planti pikinini. Nogat. Em i tok long wanpela tasol, na i tok olsem, "Long pikinini bilong yu." Dispela pikinini em Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now I say this. A covenant confirmed beforehand by God in Christ. The law, which came four hundred thirty years after, does not annul, so as to make the promise of no effect.

block.text: As bilong tok bilong mi i olsem. Pastaim God i mekim kontrak wantaim Abraham. Na taim 430 yia i go pinis, orait lo i kamap. Dispela lo i kamap bihain tru, em i no inap rausim tok bilong dispela kontrak bipo God i bin mekim. Em i no inap pinisim dispela promis God i bin mekim bipo.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if the inheritance is of the law, it is no more of promise; but God has granted it to Abraham by promise.

block.text: Sapos yumi mas bihainim lo bilong yumi ken kisim ol samting God i bin makim bilong yumi, orait yumi no kisim long rot bilong promis. Tasol yumi save, God i bin mekim promis long em bai i givim dispela ol samting long Abraham.

ReferenceBlocks.text: What then is the law? It was added because of transgressions. Until the seed should come to whom the promise has been made. It was ordained through angels by the hand of a mediator.

block.text: Sapos olsem, orait bilong wanem lo i stap? Em i olsem. God i laik bai as bilong sin em i ken kamap ples klia, olsem na bihain long em i givim promis pinis, God i givim lo tu. Na em i laik bai lo i stap inap long taim dispela pikinini i kamap, bipo God i bin promis long givim ol samting long em. God i givim dispela lo long ol ensel na ol i autim long wanpela namelman na namelman em i givim long yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now a mediator is not between one, but God is one.

block.text: Tasol sapos wanpela man em yet i laik mekim wanpela wok, em bai i no inap givim dispela wok long wanpela namelman. Orait God em i wanpela tasol, na em wanpela tasol i bin givim promis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Is the law then against the promises of God? Certainly not! For if there had been a law given which could make alive, most certainly righteousness would have been of the law.

block.text: Ating mi laik tok olsem lo em i olsem birua bilong ol promis God i bin mekim bipo? Nogat tru. Sapos God i bin givim narakain lo, em inap long givim laip long yumi, orait pasin bilong bihainim lo em inap long mekim yumi i kamap stretpela manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the Scriptures imprisoned all things under sin, that the promise by faith in Jesus Christ might be given to those who believe.

block.text: Tasol buk bilong God i tok olsem, "Sin i kalabusim olgeta manmeri," na God i larim dispela samting i kamap, bai yumi man i bilip long Jisas Krais yumi ken kisim dispela samting God i bin promis long givim long ol man i bilip long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But before faith came, we were kept in custody under the law, confined for the faith which should afterwards be revealed.

block.text: Taim bilong bilip i no kamap yet, orait lo i kalabusim yumi i stap. Na yumi stap kalabus inap taim bilong bilip i kamap ples klia pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So that the law has become our tutor to bring us to Christ, that we might be justified by faith.

block.text: Lo i stap olsem waspapa bilong yumi, bilong bringim yumi i kam long Krais, bai yumi ken bilip long gutnius na God i ken kolim yumi ol stretpela manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But now that faith has come, we are no longer under a tutor.

block.text: Na nau taim bilong bilip i kamap pinis, na yumi no i stap aninit long dispela waspapa moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For you are all children of God, through faith in Christ Jesus.

block.text: Yupela olgeta i bilip long Krais Jisas na i pas wantaim em, na long dispela pasin yupela i kamap pikinini bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For as many of you as were baptized into Christ have put on Christ.

block.text: Yupela ol manmeri i bin kisim baptais na i pas wantaim Krais, yupela olgeta i bin pasim Krais olsem man i pasim longpela klos bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There is neither Jew nor Greek, there is neither slave nor free man, there is neither male nor female; for you are all one in Christ Jesus.

block.text: Na long lain bilong Krais, i no gat ol Juda na ol Grik. I no gat ol wokboi nating na ol man i stap fri. I no gat ol man na ol meri. Nau long Krais Jisas yupela olgeta i stap wanpela tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If you are Christ’s, then you are Abraham’s seed and heirs according to promise.

block.text: Na sapos yupela i stap lain bilong Krais, orait yupela i stap pikinini bilong Abraham tu. Em yupela tasol ol lain bilong kisim ol dispela samting bipo God i bin promis long givim long ol lain bilong Abraham.

ReferenceBlocks.text: GALATIANS 4
But I say that so long as the heir is a child, he is no different from a bondservant, though he is lord of all;

block.text: Tok bilong mi em i olsem. Sapos papa i gat wanpela pikinini, orait bihain dispela pikinini bai i kisim olgeta samting bilong papa bilong en. I olsem ol dispela samting i stap pinis olsem ol samting bilong pikinini. Tasol taim pikinini i stap yangpela yet, em i stap wankain olsem ol wokboi bilong papa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: but is under guardians and stewards until the day appointed by the father.

block.text: Em i mas aninit long ol wasman na ol bosman, i go inap long taim papa i bin makim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So we also, when we were children, were held in bondage under the elemental principles of the world.

block.text: Na yumi tu i olsem. Taim yumi stap olsem ol liklik pikinini, yumi stap olsem ol wokboi nating bilong ol spirit samting i save bosim ol samting bilong skai na graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when the fullness of the time came, God sent out his Son, born to a woman, born under the law,

block.text: Tasol long taim stret God i bin makim, em i salim Pikinini bilong en i kam. Meri i karim em, na em i kamap man i stap aninit long lo,

ReferenceBlocks.text: that he might redeem those who were under the law, that we might receive the adoption of children.

block.text: bilong baim bek yumi ol manmeri i stap aninit long lo, na bilong mekim yumi i kamap pikinini bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And because you are children, God sent out the Spirit of his Son into your hearts, crying, “Abba, Father!”

block.text: Nau yupela i stap pikinini bilong God. Olsem na God i salim Spirit bilong Pikinini bilong en i kam pinis long bel bilong yumi na Spirit i mekim yumi i singaut long God olsem, "Aba, Papa."

ReferenceBlocks.text: So you are no longer a bondservant, but a son; and if a son, then an heir of God through Christ.

block.text: Olsem na yu no i stap wokboi nating moa. Nogat. God i mekim yu i kamap pikinini bilong em. Na sapos yu stap pikinini bilong God, orait yu save, yu bai kisim ol gutpela samting bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: However at that time, not knowing God, you were in bondage to those who by nature are not gods.

block.text: Bipo yupela i no save long God, na yupela i stap olsem ol wokboi nating bilong ol samting i no god tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You have come to know God, or rather to be known by God. Why do you turn back again to the weak and miserable elemental principles, to which you desire to be in bondage all over again?

block.text: Tasol nau yupela i save pinis long God. O ating mobeta mi tok, God i save pinis long yupela. Olsem na bilong wanem yupela i laik surik i go bek long ol dispela rabis spirit i no gat strong tru, na yupela i laik kamap wokboi nating bilong ol gen?

ReferenceBlocks.text: You observe days, months, seasons, and years.

block.text: Oltaim yupela i save ting yupela i mas bihainim ol lo bilong ol bikpela de bilong lotu na bilong ol nupela mun na bilong bikpela lotu bilong nupela yia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I am afraid for you, that I might have wasted my labor for you.

block.text: Mi tingting long dispela pasin bilong yupela na mi pret, nogut wok mi bin mekim namel long yupela em i lus nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I beg you, brothers, become as I am, for I also have become as you are. You did me no wrong.

block.text: Ol brata, mi askim yupela strong long kamap wankain olsem mi. Mi yet mi bin lusim lo na kamap wankain olsem yupela, na long dispela taim yupela i no bin mekim wanpela rong long mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You know that because of weakness of the flesh I preached the Good News to you the first time.

block.text: Yupela i tingim yet, a? Wanpela kain sik i mekim, na mi bin kam autim gutnius long yupela namba wan taim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: That which was a temptation to you in my flesh, you didn’t despise nor reject; but you received me as an angel of God, even as Christ Jesus.

block.text: Bodi bilong mi i no strong, na dispela i givim bikpela hevi long yupela. Tasol yupela i no bin givim baksait long mi, na yupela i no les long i stap wantaim mi. Nogat. Yupela i kisim mi olsem yupela i kisim wanpela ensel bilong God, o olsem yupela i kisim Krais Jisas yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: What was the blessing you enjoyed? For I testify to you that, if possible, you would have plucked out your eyes and given them to me.

block.text: Long dispela taim yupela i bin amamas na belgut long mi, tasol dispela amamas bilong yupela nau i stap we? Mi tok tru tumas, long dispela taim, yupela i gat bikpela laik long helpim mi, na sapos yupela inap kamautim ai bilong yupela, orait yupela bai i kamautim na givim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then, have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

block.text: Olsem wanem? Mi autim tok tru long yupela, na dispela i mekim mi i kamap birua bilong yupela, a?

ReferenceBlocks.text: They zealously seek you in no good way. No, they desire to alienate you, that you may seek them.

block.text: Harim. Ol dispela man i wok long grisim yupela, ol i no gat tingting bilong helpim yupela. Nogat. Ol i laik banisim yupela, bai yupela i tingting tasol long helpim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But it is always good to be zealous in a good cause, and not only when I am present with you.

block.text: Sapos yumi tingting strong long mekim gutpela pasin long ol arapela, em i orait. Oltaim yupela i ken mekim dispela pasin, na i no long taim mi stap wantaim yupela tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: My little children, I am again in travail until Christ is formed in you.

block.text: Ol pikinini bilong mi, mi pilim pen gen olsem pen i kamap long meri i laik karim pikinini, long wanem, mi laik bai yupela i mas kamap ol pikinini tru bilong God wankain olsem Krais yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I could wish to be present with you now, and to change my tone, for I am perplexed about you.

block.text: Sori tumas, mi no i stap wantaim yupela nau. Sapos mi stap wantaim yupela, orait mi inap mekim gutpela tok liklik long yupela. Mi wari tru long yupela, na mi no save, bai mi helpim yupela olsem wanem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Tell me, you that desire to be under the law, don’t you listen to the law?

block.text: Yupela ol man i laik aninit long lo, yupela tokim mi nau. Ating yupela i no save long tok bilong lo, a?

ReferenceBlocks.text: For it is written that Abraham had two sons, one by the handmaid, and one by the free woman.

block.text: Buk bilong God i tok olsem, Abraham i gat tupela pikinini man. Wokmeri nating, Hagar, em i karim wanpela, na meri i stap fri em i karim wanpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: However, the son by the handmaid was born according to the flesh, but the son by the free woman was born through promise.

block.text: Dispela pikinini bilong wokmeri nating, em i bin kamap long rot ol manmeri i save kamapim pikinini long en. Tasol pikinini bilong meri i stap fri, God i mekim promis na em i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These things contain an allegory, for these are two covenants. One is from Mount Sinai, bearing children to bondage, which is Hagar.

block.text: I gat tok bokis insait long dispela stori. Dispela tupela meri i makim tupela kontrak. Hagar i makim kontrak bilong maunten Sainai, na ol pikinini bilong en i kamap wokboi nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this Hagar is Mount Sinai in Arabia, and answers to the Jerusalem that exists now, for she is in bondage with her children.

block.text: Hagar em i makim maunten Sainai, dispela maunten bilong kantri Arebia, na tu em i makim dispela Jerusalem nau i stap. Dispela Jerusalem i stap wokmeri nating wantaim ol pikinini bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the Jerusalem that is above is free, which is the mother of us all.
For it is written,

block.text: Tasol narapela Jerusalem i stap long heven, em i stap fri. Em i mama bilong yumi.
Buk bilong God i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Rejoice, you barren who don’t bear. Break forth and shout, you that don’t travail. For more are the children of the desolate than of her who has a husband.”

block.text: "Yu tarangu meri i no save karim pikinini, yu ken amamas. Yu meri, yu no bin pilim pen bilong karim pikinini, yu ken belgut. Yu mas singim song na amamas na singaut, long wanem, bai yu gat planti pikinini moa, i winim ol pikinini bilong meri i gat man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now we, brothers, as Isaac was, are children of promise.

block.text: Ol brata, yupela i wankain olsem Aisak. Long promis bilong God yupela i kamap pikinini bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But as then, he who was born according to the flesh persecuted him who was born according to the Spirit, so also it is now.

block.text: Tasol dispela pikinini i bin kamap long rot ol manmeri i save kamapim pikinini long en, em i bin mekim nogut long dispela arapela pikinini i bin kamap long strong bilong Holi Spirit. Na nau tu wankain pasin tasol i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: However what does the Scripture say?

block.text: Buk bilong God i gat wanem tok? Em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Throw out the handmaid and her son, for the son of the handmaid will not inherit with the son of the free woman.”

block.text: "Rausim dispela wokmeri wantaim pikinini bilong en. Pikinini bilong wokmeri em i no ken kisim ol hap samting bilong papa wantaim pikinini bilong meri i stap fri."

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then, brothers, we are not children of a handmaid, but of the free woman.

block.text: Buk bilong God i tok olsem.
Orait ol brata, yumi save, yumi no pikinini bilong wokmeri nating. Nogat. Yumi pikinini bilong meri i stap fri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: GALATIANS 5
Stand firm therefore in the liberty by which Christ has made us free, and don’t be entangled again with a yoke of bondage.

block.text: Krais i bin mekim yumi i kamap fri, bilong yumi no ken i stap aninit long lo. Olsem na yupela i mas sanap strong. Yupela i no ken larim ol man i mekim yupela i kamap olsem ol wokboi nating gen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, I, Paul, tell you that if you receive circumcision, Christ will profit you nothing.

block.text: Harim. Mi Pol mi tokim yupela, sapos yupela i larim ol i katim skin bilong yupela, orait wok bilong Krais bai i no inap helpim yupela liklik. Nogat tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yes, I testify again to every man who receives circumcision, that he is a debtor to do the whole law.

block.text: Yupela olgeta man i larim ol i katim skin bilong yupela, mi laik tokaut klia gen long yupela olsem, sapos yupela i mekim pasin olsem, orait yupela i mas bihainim olgeta lo wantaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Christ has become of no effect to you, you who desire to be justified by the law. You have fallen away from grace.

block.text: Sapos yupela i laik bihainim lo, na long dispela rot yupela i laik bai God i kolim yupela stretpela man, orait yupela i lusim Krais pinis. Yupela i lusim pinis marimari bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For we, through the Spirit, by faith wait for the hope of righteousness.

block.text: Long strong bilong Holi Spirit yumi bilip long God na yumi wetim em i kolim yumi stretpela man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision amounts to anything, nor uncircumcision, but faith working through love.

block.text: Sapos man i stap long Krais Jisas, orait pasin bilong katim skin em i samting nating, na pasin bilong man i no katim skin, em tu i samting nating. Tasol pasin bilong man i bilip na dispela i kirapim em long laikim tru ol arapela, dispela em i samting tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You were running well! Who interfered with you that you should not obey the truth?

block.text: Bipo yupela i save wokabaut gut long rot bilong Krais. Tasol husat i pasim rot na yupela i no bihainim moa tok i tru?

ReferenceBlocks.text: This persuasion is not from him who calls you.

block.text: Dispela tingting nau yupela i bihainim em i no kam long God, em God i save singautim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A little yeast grows through the whole lump.

block.text: Tingim. Liklik yis tasol em inap long mekim olgeta bret i solap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have confidence toward you in the Lord that you will think no other way. But he who troubles you will bear his judgment, whoever he is.

block.text: Mi bilip olsem Bikpela bai i helpim yupela, na bai yupela i bihainim tingting bilong mi, na bai yupela i no holim narapela tingting. Mi no save husat i wok long paulim tingting bilong yupela, tasol maski, dispela man bai i kisim pe nogut long rong bilong em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I, brothers, if I still preach circumcision, why am I still persecuted? Then the stumbling block of the cross has been removed.

block.text: Ol brata, sapos i tru mi save autim tok yet long ol man i mas katim skin, orait bilong wanem ol i wok yet long mekim nogut long mi? Sapos mi tok long ol man i mas katim skin, orait tok bilong diwai kros i no inap bagarapim moa tingting bilong ol man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I wish that those who disturb you would cut themselves off.

block.text: Ol dispela man i paulim tingting bilong yupela, ol i strong long dispela pasin bilong katim skin bilong sem. Tasol mobeta ol i katim skin bilong ol yet na rausim bol bilong ol olgeta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For you, brothers, were called for freedom. Only don’t use your freedom for gain to the flesh, but through love be servants to one another.

block.text: Tru, ol brata, God i bin singautim yupela bilong yupela i ken i stap fri. Tasol nogut yupela i ting olsem, "Mipela i stap fri, olsem na mipela i ken mekim ol pasin bilong olpela bel." Nogat. Yupela i no ken ting olsem. Yupela wan wan i mas i stap olsem wokboi bilong ol arapela manmeri bilong God, na yupela i mas givim bel bilong yupela long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the whole law is fulfilled in one word, in this:

block.text: Olgeta tok bilong lo i stap insait long dispela wanpela tok tasol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You shall love your neighbor as yourself.”

block.text: "Yu mas laikim ol wantok olsem yu laikim yu yet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if you bite and devour one another, be careful that you don’t consume one another.

block.text: Tasol sapos yupela i kros kros na pait nabaut namel long yupela yet, orait yupela lukaut. Nogut yupela olgeta i lus wantaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I say, walk by the Spirit, and you won’t fulfill the lust of the flesh.

block.text: Tok bilong mi em i olsem, yupela i mas larim Holi Spirit i stiaim wokabaut bilong yupela. Sapos yupela i mekim olsem, orait yupela bai i no inap bihainim laik bilong olpela bel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the flesh lusts against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh. These are contrary to one another, that you may not do the things that you desire.

block.text: Yumi save, olpela bel em i laik daunim Holi Spirit, na Holi Spirit em i laik daunim olpela bel. Tupela i birua wantaim, na samting yupela i laik mekim, em yupela i no inap mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if you are led by the Spirit, you are not under the law.

block.text: Na sapos yupela i bihainim Holi Spirit, orait yupela i no i stap aninit long lo.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the works of the flesh are obvious, which are: adultery, sexual immorality, uncleanness, lustfulness,

block.text: Yupela i save pinis long pasin bilong olpela bel. Em olkain pasin olsem, pasin pamuk na pasin doti na pasin bilong bel i kirap long mekim ol pasin nogut,

ReferenceBlocks.text: idolatry, sorcery, hatred, strife, jealousies, outbursts of anger, rivalries, divisions, heresies,

block.text: na pasin bilong lotu long ol giaman god na pasin bilong mekim olkain posin na pasin birua na belhat na kros na bel nogut na mangal na pasin bilong ting long yu yet tasol na tok pait na brukim lain,

ReferenceBlocks.text: envyings, murders, drunkenness, orgies, and things like these; of which I forewarn you, even as I also forewarned you, that those who practice such things will not inherit the Kingdom of God.

block.text: na pasin bilong bel kaskas long ol man i stap gut na pasin bilong spak na hambak na singaut bikmaus nabaut, na ol kain kain pasin olsem. Bipo mi tokim yupela pinis, na nau mi mekim wankain tok gen. Olgeta man i mekim ol dispela kain pasin, ol bai i no inap i go insait long kingdom bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faith,

block.text: Tasol Holi Spirit i save kirapim yumi long mekim ol gutpela pasin olsem, pasin bilong laikim tru ol arapela na pasin bilong amamas na pasin bilong i stap bel isi na pasin bilong i no belhat kwik na pasin bilong helpim ol man na mekim gutpela pasin long ol na pasin bilong wokabaut stret oltaim

ReferenceBlocks.text: gentleness, and self-control. Against such things there is no law.

block.text: na pasin bilong i stap isi na pasin bilong daunim laik bilong olpela bel. I no gat wanpela lo i tambuim ol dispela kain pasin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Those who belong to Christ have crucified the flesh with its passions and lusts.

block.text: Olgeta manmeri bilong lain bilong Krais ol i kisim olpela bel wantaim ol laik na mangal nogut bilong en, na ol i nilim pinis long diwai kros na em i dai pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If we live by the Spirit, let’s also walk by the Spirit.

block.text: Holi Spirit em i givim laip long yumi, olsem na yumi mas larim Holi Spirit i stiaim olgeta wokabaut bilong yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let’s not become conceited, provoking one another, and envying one another.

block.text: Yumi no ken litimapim nating nem bilong yumi yet, na yumi no ken sutim bel bilong ol arapela long kirapim pait, na yumi no ken mangal long ol samting bilong ol arapela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: GALATIANS 6
Brothers, even if a man is caught in some fault, you who are spiritual must restore such a one in a spirit of gentleness; looking to yourself so that you also aren’t tempted.

block.text: Ol brata, sapos yupela i save olsem wanpela bilong yupela i bin mekim sin, orait yupela man i bihainim Holi Spirit, yupela i mas mekim pasin isi long dispela man na helpim em long stretim pasin bilong em. Tasol yupela i mas lukaut gut long yupela yet. Nogut Satan i traim yupela na yupela tu i pundaun long sin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Bear one another’s burdens, and so fulfill the law of Christ.

block.text: Yupela i mas helpim ol arapela long karim hevi bilong ol. Long dispela pasin bai yupela inapim tru lo bilong Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if a man thinks himself to be something when he is nothing, he deceives himself.

block.text: Sapos wanpela man i ting em i gat nem, tasol em i no gat nem, orait dispela man i giamanim em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But let each man test his own work, and then he will take pride in himself and not in his neighbor.

block.text: Olgeta man i mas skelim wok bilong ol yet, em i gutpela o nogat. Man i mekim olsem, em i ken amamas long pasin em yet i mekim na em i no mas skelim pasin bilong en wantaim pasin bilong narapela man,

ReferenceBlocks.text: For each man will bear his own burden.

block.text: long wanem, olgeta man wan wan bai i karim hevi bilong pasin ol yet i mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But let him who is taught in the word share all good things with him who teaches.

block.text: Man i skul long tok bilong God, em i ken givim sampela bilong olgeta gutpela samting bilong en i go long man i skulim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don’t be deceived. God is not mocked, for whatever a man sows, that he will also reap.

block.text: Nogut yupela i giamanim yupela yet na yupela i ting yupela inap long trikim God. Yupela bai i no inap tru. Yu planim pikinini bilong wanem kain kaikai, em dispela kain kaikai tasol bai i kamap long gaden bilong yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he who sows to his own flesh will from the flesh reap corruption. But he who sows to the Spirit will from the Spirit reap eternal life.

block.text: Sapos wanpela man i bihainim ol laik bilong olpela bel bilong em yet, orait dispela pasin bilong olpela bel bai i kamapim kaikai nogut na em bai i bagarap olgeta. Tasol sapos em i bihainim pasin bilong Holi Spirit, orait Holi Spirit bai i kamapim laip long dispela man na em bai i stap gut oltaim oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let us not be weary in doing good, for we will reap in due season, if we don’t give up.

block.text: Olsem na yumi no ken les long mekim gutpela pasin. Sapos yumi no slek long mekim wok, orait long taim bilong kisim kaikai yumi bai kisim gutpela kaikai tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then, as we have opportunity, let’s do what is good toward all men, and especially toward those who are of the household of the faith.

block.text: Olsem na wanem taim yumi inap mekim gutpela pasin long ol arapela, yumi mas mekim. Na yumi mas strong tru long mekim gutpela pasin long ol arapela manmeri i bilip long Bikpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: See with what large letters I write to you with my own hand.

block.text: Dispela hap tok em mi yet mi raitim. Lukim ol dispela bikpela leta mi wokim bilong raitim tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: As many as desire to look good in the flesh, they compel you to be circumcised; only that they may not be persecuted for the cross of Christ.

block.text: Harim. Ol dispela man i strong tumas long katim skin bilong yupela, ol i mekim olsem, long wanem, ol i laik kisim biknem long ai bilong ol arapela man. Ol i save pret na ting olsem, "Nogut ol arapela man i save olsem yumi bilip long diwai kros bilong Krais, na ol i laik mekim nogut long yumi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: For even they who receive circumcision don’t keep the law themselves, but they desire to have you circumcised, that they may boast in your flesh.

block.text: Ol man i kisim pinis dispela mak bilong ol Juda, ol yet i no save bihainim gut lo. Tasol ol i laik katim skin bilong yupela, bai ol i ken kisim biknem long dispela samting ol i bin mekim long skin bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But far be it from me to boast, except in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, through which the world has been crucified to me, and I to the world.

block.text: Tasol mi no inap litimapim nem bilong mi yet o bilong wanpela man. Nogat. Mi bai litimapim nem bilong Jisas Krais tasol. Em i dai pinis long diwai kros, na mi amamas long dispela tasol. Long wok Krais i bin mekim long diwai kros, pasin bilong dispela graun em i dai pinis long tingting bilong mi, na i olsem mi yet mi dai pinis long diwai kros na mi no inap bihainim moa ol pasin bilong graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For in Christ Jesus neither is circumcision anything, nor uncircumcision, but a new creation.

block.text: Nau pasin bilong katim skin em i samting nating, na pasin bilong man i no katim skin, em tu i samting nating. God i mekim yumi i kamap nupela manmeri, na dispela tasol em i samting tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: As many as walk by this rule, peace and mercy be on them, and on God’s Israel.

block.text: God i ken marimari long olgeta manmeri i save holim dispela tingting na bihainim, na em i ken mekim bel bilong ol i stap isi. Ol dispela manmeri ol i lain Israel tru bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: From now on, let no one cause me any trouble, for I bear the marks of the Lord Jesus branded on my body.

block.text: Mi no laik bai wanpela man i givim hevi moa long mi. Nogat. Ol man i bin paitim mi, na ol dispela mak i stap pinis long bodi bilong mi, ol i soim olsem mi wokman tru bilong Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit, brothers. Amen.

block.text: Ol brata, marimari bilong Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas Krais em i ken i stap wantaim spirit bilong yupela wan wan. I tru.
